業者名稱: 建台藥品股份有限公司淡水廠
地址: 台北縣淡水鎮義山里下圭柔山七十之十五號
效能(適應症): 鴿細菌性呼吸器感染症
ingredients: ERYTHROMYCIN THIOCYANATE 6.25MG(POT.); SOD.IODIDE 75MCG;SOD. ARSANILATE 6.5MG; ANEURINE HCL 100MCG;CHOLINE BITARTRATE 20MG; VITAMIN A PALMITATE 1000IU;VITAMIN D3 25IU; VITAMIN E ACETATE 1000MCG;RIBOFLAVIN 250MCG; VITAMIN C 2.5MG;NICOTINAMIDE 1.5MG; FOLIC ACID 25MCG;DL-METHIONINE 6MG; PYRIDOXINE HCL 100MCG;MANGANESE SULFATE 7.5MG; COPPER SULFATE 25MCG;ZINC SULFATE 10MG.
